00018 ISR(TIMER2_OVF_vect)
00019 {
00020         checkDistance();

00022         //2sec
00023         if((voltageCheck++) >= 120){
00024                 voltageCheck = 0;
00025                 double volt = 0;
00026                 //get currente voltage value
00027                 bot_update();
00028                 //calculate the voltage from adc-value
00029                 volt = 0.0166 * bot_supply -1.19;
00030                 if( volt <= 8.5){
00031                         tone(3000,100);
00032                 }
00033         }

00037 void initBot() {
00038 
00039         bot_init();
00040         sei();
00041         advDisplay_init();
00042         advDisplay_append_line("Martini!");
00043         advDisplay_append_line("Init:");
00044         delay(1000);
00045 
00046         spi_init();
00047         advDisplay_append_line("Motor      OK");
00048         delay(500);
00049 
00050         niboCom_init();
00051         advDisplay_append_line("XBEE       OK");
00052         delay(500);
00053 
00054         sound_init();
00055         advDisplay_append_line("Audio      OK");
00056         delay(500);
00057 
00058         copro_ir_startMeasure();
00059         advDisplay_append_line("Sensoren   OK");
00060         delay(500);
00061 
00062         ndsScan_init();
00063         advDisplay_append_line("NDS        OK");
00064         delay(500);
00065 
00066         leds_init();
00067         advDisplay_append_line("LEDS       OK");
00068         delay(500);
00069 
00070         //Timer-interrupt init
00071         // set Prescaler 1024
00072         TCCR2 = ((1<<CS22)|(0<<CS21)|(1<<CS20));
00073         //enable Timer-Overflow-Interrupt
00074         TIMSK |= (1<<TOIE2);
00075         advDisplay_append_line("Interrupts OK");
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080         advDisplay_append_line("Bereit!");
00081         delay(1000);
00082         advDisplay_clear();
00083 
00084 
00085 }

00087 int main(void) {
00088 
00089         uint8_t mode = MODE_MAN;
00090         uint8_t cmd = niboCom_cmd_none;
00091 
00092         uint8_t *nds_scan;
00093 
00094         initBot();
00095 
00096 
00097         while (1) {
00098 
00099                 cmd = niboCom_getCMD();
00100                 advDisplay_printVoltage();
00101 
00102                 if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_auto){
00103                         mode = MODE_AUTO;
00104                         advDisplay_append_line("-> Automatik");
00105                 }
00106                 else if((PIND & (1 << PD4)) == 0){
00107                         mode = MODE_AUTO;
00108                         advDisplay_append_line("-> Automatik");
00109                         delay(500);
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 //auto mode
00113                 while(mode == MODE_AUTO){
00114 
00115                         cmd = niboCom_getCMD();
00116                         advDisplay_printVoltage();
00117 
00118                         if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_man){
00119                                 mode = MODE_MAN;
00120                                 advDisplay_append_line("-> Manuell");
00121                                 delay(500);
00122                                 break;
00123                         }
00124                         else if((PIND & (1 << PD4)) == 0){
00125                                 mode = MODE_MAN;
00126                                 advDisplay_append_line("-> Manuell");
00127                                 delay(500);
00128                                 break;
00129                         }
00130 
00131                         if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nds_distance){
00132                                 nds_scan = ndsScan(NDS_SCAN_DEG);
00133                                 niboCom_putNDSDistance((180/NDS_SCAN_DEG)+1,nds_scan);
00134                         }
00135                         autoMode();
00136 
00137                 }//end auto mode
00138                 copro_stop();
00139 
00140                 //command execution manual mode
00141 
00142                 if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nds_distance){
00143                         nds_scan = ndsScan(NDS_SCAN_DEG);
00144                         niboCom_putNDSDistance((180/NDS_SCAN_DEG)+1,nds_scan);
00145                 }
00146                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_drive){
00147                         uint8_t driveStatus = drive_front_free;
00148                         while(driveStatus == drive_front_free){
00149                                 cmd = niboCom_getCMD();
00150                                 if(cmd != niboCom_cmd_nibo_stop){
00151                                         driveStatus = drive(20);
00152                                 }
00153                                 else{
00154                                         copro_stop();
00155                                         break;
00156                                 }
00157                                 if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nds_distance){
00158                                         nds_scan = ndsScan(NDS_SCAN_DEG);
00159                                         niboCom_putNDSDistance((180/NDS_SCAN_DEG)+1,nds_scan);
00160                                 }
00161                         }
00162 
00163                 }
00164                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_left){
00165                         drive_turn_left();
00166                 }
00167                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_halfLeft){
00168                         drive_turn_halfLeft();
00169                 }
00170                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_halfRight){
00171                         drive_turn_halfRight();
00172                 }
00173                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_right){
00174                         drive_turn_right();
00175                 }
00176                 else if(cmd == niboCom_cmd_nibo_turn){
00177                         drive_turn_around();
00178                 }
00179 
00180         }
00181 }

00183 void autoMode()
00184 {
00185     uint8_t driveStatus = drive_all_blocked;
00186     drive(20);
00187     driveStatus = drive_getFreePath();
00188 
00189     if(driveStatus == drive_right_free){
00190                 drive_turn_halfRight();
00191         }
00192         else if(driveStatus == drive_left_free){
00193                 drive_turn_halfLeft();
00194         }
00195         else if(driveStatus == drive_all_blocked){
00196                 while(1){
00197                         copro_setTargetRel(-10, -10, 10);
00198                         delay(1500);
00199                         driveStatus = drive_getFreePath();
00200 
00201                         if(drive_isRightFree()){
00202                                 copro_stop();
00203                                 drive_turn_halfRight();
00204                                 break;
00205                         }
00206                         else if(drive_isLeftFree()){
00207                                 copro_stop();
00208                                 drive_turn_halfLeft();
00209                                 break;
00210                         }
00211                 }
00212         }
00213 }

00216 void checkDistance(){
00217         copro_update();
00218         if((copro_distance[0]/256) > irAbstand){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,7);}
00219         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,7);}
00220 
00221         if((copro_distance[1]/256) > irAbstand){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,6);}
00222         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,6);}
00223 
00224         if((copro_distance[2]/256) > irAbstand){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,5);leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,4);}
00225         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,5);leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,4);}
00226 
00227         if((copro_distance[3]/256) > irAbstand){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,3);}
00228         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,3);}
00229 
00230         if((copro_distance[4]/256) > irAbstand){leds_set_status(LEDS_RED,2);}
00231         else{leds_set_status(LEDS_GREEN,2);}
00232 
00233 }
